title: Dark Mode is here!
description: We've added **full support for dark mode** across the dashboard, with automatic detection of your system preferences.

title: Dashboard 2× Faster
description: We've optimized **data fetching** and rendering — your dashboard now loads **twice as fast!**

title: New Integrations: Slack & Notion
description: You can now connect your workspace with **Slack** and **Notion** for real-time updates and sync.

title: Team Mentions in Comments
description: You can now mention teammates using `@username` in any comment thread — they'll be notified instantly.

title: Legacy API Endpoints Deprecated
description: We're deprecating **v1 API endpoints** in favor of our improved v2 API. Support for v1 will end on **December 31, 2025**.

title: Fixed Pipeline Execution on Retry
description: Resolved an issue where pipeline retries would fail to restore **artifact state** correctly.
